# Poison Cloud Technique

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Hiden~Aburame Clan, Ninjutsu
- Class: Offensive
- Range: Short, Mid
- Users: Torune Aburame
- Media: Anime, Game

## Summary
Torune puts his hands together to form a small poisonous smokescreen sphere from his rinkaichÅ« between his hands, Torune can then blow the smokescreen across the area in front of him, the poisonous smokescreen when spread gets bigger. If touched or inhaled, it is a guaranteed fatality.
